item.title: 2 Under-the-Radar Energy Stocks to Watch for AI Demand in 2026
item.description: Data centers need massive power; New Fortress Energy and Nano Nuclear Energy offer two growth avenues as AI demand strains global electricity grids

item.title: The Application-Layer Rotation: 3 AI Pure Plays Poised to Win in 2026
item.description: Capital is moving from chip manufacturers to the application layer, where companies are generating real revenue from deployed artificial intelligence.

item.title: The 5 Most Upgraded Stocks from 2025: Double-Digit Upside in 2026
item.description: The five most upgraded stocks from 2025 are among the hottest buys for 2026, projected to rise by double-digits, and the estimates are still climbing.

item.title: Why GE Vernova, PG&E and Mastercard Are Income Boosters for 2026
item.description: Dividend increases of 100% are the latest reward for shareholders in GEV and PCG. Meanwhile, Mastercard's latest increase comes in well above 10%.

item.title: These 3 Consumer Stocks Just Authorized Big-Time Buyback Programs
item.description: KR, LULU, and ETSY are making buyback headlines. One of these names holds a top 10 buyback yield among S&P 500 stocks and just added more ammunition.
